thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Discover Financial Services Credit-Card Balances Grow as Consumer-Spending Rises

author: AnnaMaria Andriotis
title: Discover Financial Services Credit-Card Balances Grow as Consumer-Spending Rises
text:
Discover Financial Services reported first-quarter earnings Thursday that beat analysts’ expectations due in large part to a big increase in credit-card balances.
Profit for the quarter increased 18%, to $666 million, or $1.82 per diluted share, from $564 million, or $1.43 a share a year earlier. Analysts polled by Thomson Reuters expected a profit of $642 million and earnings of $1.77 a share. The company’s revenue, net of interest expense, came in at $2.6 billion, just above analysts’ expectations and up 10% from a year...
